properties.title: Textual IRC Client Extras
properties.certificate: Developer ID Installer: BestTechie Holdings, Inc. (2Q694P9U2Y)

choice.title: Scripts
choice.description: This package installs all custom scripts that are exempt from the sandbox. What's included: apps, music, np, page, qt, spotify, rdio, vlc, and yolo.

choice.title: Extensions
choice.description: This package installs extensions that may be found useful to a select group of users.

choice.title: iTunes Controller
choice.description: This extension, created by Tobias Pollmann, adds the "/itunes" command to Textual providing a command-based interface for playing, pausing, going to next song (or previous), and more. It also adds an auto-announce feature for now playing information ON BY DEFAULT. See "/itunes help" for a list of available commands and the included preference pane for configuration options.

choice.title: Smiley Converter
choice.description: This extension can be used to automatically convert text based smileys to emoji icons. For example, the smiley ":-)" becomes "ðŸ˜Š" or "^_^" becomes "ðŸ˜„"

choice.title: Wiki-style Link Parser
choice.description: Wiki-style link parser to automatically replace [[<title>]] text blocks with the actual link.

locale.resource:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1187\cocoasubrtf370 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Menlo-Regular;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 This installation provides add-ons for the Textual IRC Client that are no longer packaged by default because of difficulties with the Mac App Store sandbox environment. \ \ ----------------------------------------------------\ \ Commands available after installation:\ \ \'95 apps \f1\fs28 \cf1 \CocoaLigature0 \f0\fs26 \cf0 \CocoaLigature1 \'97 List all running applications.\ \'95 music \f1\fs28 \cf1 \CocoaLigature0 \f0\fs26 \cf0 \CocoaLigature1 \'97 iTunes library size information.\ \'95 np \f1\fs28 \cf1 \CocoaLigature0 \f0\fs26 \cf0 \CocoaLigature1 \'97 Now playing information for iTunes.\ \'95 page \f1\fs28 \cf1 \CocoaLigature0 \f0\fs26 \cf0 \CocoaLigature1 \'97 Information about active page in Safari.\ \'95 qt \f1\fs28 \cf1 \CocoaLigature0 \f0\fs26 \cf0 \CocoaLigature1 \'97 Now playing information for QuickTime.\ \'95 spotify \f1\fs28 \cf1 \CocoaLigature0 \f0\fs26 \cf0 \CocoaLigature1 \'97 Now playing information for Spotify. \ \'95 radium \f1\fs28 \cf1 \CocoaLigature0 \f0\fs26 \cf0 \CocoaLigature1 \'97 Now playing information for Radium.\ \'95 rdio \f1\fs28 \cf1 \CocoaLigature0 \f0\fs26 \cf0 \CocoaLigature1 \'97 Now playing information for Rdio.\ \'95 vlc \f1\fs28 \cf1 \CocoaLigature0 \f0\fs26 \cf0 \CocoaLigature1 \'97 Now playing information for VLC.\ \'95 yolo \f1\fs28 \cf1 \CocoaLigature0 \f0\fs26 \cf0 \CocoaLigature1 \'97 You only live once.\ \ Also included:\ \'95 Advanced iTunes controller.\ \'95 Automatic smiley converter. \ \'95 Wiki-style link parser.\ \ }

requirement.message: The ability for addons to be executed outside of the Mac OS sandbox was not introduced until Mountain Lion. Installing these addons on an earlier version of Mac OS will result in them doing absolutely nothing.
